title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1587/95 of 30 June 1995 fixing the amount of aid for certain grain legumes for the 1995/96 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1587/95  of 30 June 1995 fixing the amount of aid for certain grain legumes for the 1995/96 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1995/96 marketing year the aid for the production of grain  legumes introduced by Regulation (EEC) No 762/89 shall be ECU 181 per hectare sown and harvested.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the  Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
